body_html: BTW we fixed this problem (and got a good speedup, and also fixed some occassional multiprocessing hangs) in fastai by switching to ThreadPool. Requires libs that release the GIL of course, but opencv does that. :)
body_text: BTW we fixed this problem (and got a good speedup, and also fixed some occassional multiprocessing hangs) in fastai by switching to ThreadPool. Requires libs that release the GIL of course, but opencv does that. :)
body: BTW we fixed this problem (and got a good speedup, and also fixed some occassional multiprocessing hangs) in fastai by switching to ThreadPool. Requires libs that release the GIL of course, but opencv does that. :)
